rows.label: qev090804_MSG0001
rows.name: Many Nopon have already been lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0001_02
rows.name: Gobbled up by bloody king...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0002
rows.name: Friends must hurry and slay him before any more die![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0003
rows.name: Bloody king could be out attacking Nopon right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0004
rows.name:
Hurry! Track bloody king down with friends' fancy
front-tier navigator![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0005
rows.name: Many Nopon have already died to bloody king.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0006
rows.name: Friends must hurry and slay him before any more die![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0007
rows.name: Glasses friend! What happened with bloody king?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0008
rows.name: Did friend stop Gelvo Banth so Nopon can live in peace?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0009
rows.name: Your noble people will never have to fear that monster again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0010
rows.name: Consider him deposed. Permanently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0011
rows.name: This true? Truly?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0012
rows.name: Oh-ho-ho-hooooo! Pulala not have words![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0013
rows.name: H.B. is amazing! H.B. is best friend in world! H.B. is genius![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0014
rows.name: And seeing you so happy makes me happy as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev090804_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell H.B. he's completely right.

rows.label: qev090804_JNK0020
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: qev090804_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask H.B. if he wouldn't rather have fortune and glory.

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0015
rows.name:
Such happiness is the reason we fight.
It's a simple truth that is easily forgotten.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0016
rows.name: Come. I fight for the same reason as you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0017
rows.name: To bring happiness and peace to good people everywhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0018
rows.name:
Though I fear the current state of BLADE
is too inefficient to help everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0019
rows.name: Once I'm in charge, however...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'll whip the system into a logical order
and have productivity through the roof.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090804_MSG0021
rows.name:
You're one of my scant few equals, you know?
So I expect big contributions in the future.[ST:wait ]
